title: Nickel Market Crisis Sends London Metal Exchange Scrambling to Prevent Damage
summary: Chinese nickel giant at center of action, Tsingshan, received financial lifeline from banks to help meet margin calls related to $8 billion in paper losses. The metals industry, financial regulators and Chinese officials rushed to resolve a crisis in London's nickel market, which remained on ice after an ill-fated trade sparked mammoth price gains and billions of dollars of losses.
Prediction:
- Tsingshan Holding Group Co Ltd (HKG: 0358) will increase because they are the Chinese nickel giant that received the financial lifeline from banks.
- Glencore PLC (LON: GLEN) will decrease because they are a competitor of Tsingshan Holding Group Co Ltd.
- BHP Billiton Ltd (ASX: BHP) will decrease because they are a competitor of Tsingshan Holding Group Co Ltd.

nbrs.Prediction:
- The Walt Disney Company (NYSE: DIS) will increase because Netflix is no longer a direct competitor, and they have other strong businesses.
- Netflix, Inc. (NASDAQ: NFLX) will increase because the analyst upgraded the stock, and it has come down recently.

nbrs.title: DraftKings CEO Jason Robins Has A Warning For Those Selling The Stock
nbrs.summary: The CEO of a leading publicly-traded sports betting company has a warning for investors thinking of selling shares near the 52-week low.
nbrs.Prediction:
- Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) will increase because the CEO of a leading publicly-traded sports betting company has a warning for investors thinking of selling shares near the 52-week low.
- DraftKings Inc. (NASDAQ: DKNG) will increase because the CEO of a leading publicly-traded sports betting company has a warning for investors thinking of selling shares near the 52-week low.
- Twitter, Inc. (NYSE: TWTR) will decrease because the CEO of a leading publicly-traded sports betting company has a warning for investors thinking of selling shares near the 52-week

nbrs.title: Why Palantir Shares Are Ripping Higher
nbrs.summary: Palantir Technologies Inc (NYSE: PLTR) is surging Wednesday after Piper Sandler analyst Weston Twigg initiated coverage on the stock with an Overweight rating and a $15 price target.
nbrs.Prediction: - Palantir Technologies Inc (NYSE: PLTR) will continue to surge because they have a new analyst that has given them an Overweight rating.

nbrs.title: Chart Wars: Between Moderna And Novavax, Which COVID Stock Will Soar Higher?
nbrs.summary: Moderna, Inc (NASDAQ: MRNA) and Novavax, Inc (NASDAQ: NVAX) were trading up over 10% and 8%, respectively, at one point on Wednesday, boosted by the S&P 500’s almost 2.6% intraday gain.
nbrs.Prediction:
- Moderna, Inc (NASDAQ: MRNA) will continue to increase because they are working on a better vaccine than Novavax.
- Novavax, Inc (NASDAQ: NVAX) will continue to decrease because their vaccine is not as good as Moderna's.

nbrs.title: Chart Wars: Between Snap And Pinterest, Which Stock Is Less Risky?
nbrs.summary: Snap, Inc (NYSE: SNAP) and Pinterest, Inc (NYSE: PINS) were trading 8% higher at one point on Wednesday, as the general markets rebounded from a steep 4-day downturn during which the S&P 500 declined over 5%.
nbrs.Prediction:
- Pinterest, Inc (NYSE: PINS) will continue to increase because they are a less risky investment than Snap, Inc (NYSE: SNAP).
- Snap, Inc (NYSE: SNAP) will continue to decrease because they are a more risky investment than Pinterest, Inc (NYSE: PINS).
